Welcome to Arcade Crawler – a thrilling retro-style arcade adventure where reflexes meet strategy!

 ------------GAME RULES------------

 🕹️ Take control of the battlefield as waves of centipedes crawl across the screen.

 🍄 Dodge or destroy mushrooms that block your shots and change enemy paths.

 🐍 Shoot the centipede to split it into smaller segments – but beware, each part moves on its own!

 🕷️ Watch out for spiders! They devour mushrooms and add chaos to the arena.

 💣 Blast through mushrooms – it takes 5 hits to destroy one.

 ⚠️ Survive until the centipede reaches the bottom – but don’t let it touch your gun!
